title: Game of the Month
description: Scorched Earth: One team is given 4 backpack bombs and must blow up 4 target buildings worth varying abouts of points.

title: Legacy Game
description: Black Hawk Down: One team needs to rescue two downed soldiers and blow up the helicopter.

title: $10 Off Standard Admission on Wed/Thurs
description: Use code WARRIOR on Wednesdays and code TACTICAL on Thursdays to get $10 off standard admission.

title: Summer League
description: Runs every Tuesday from 5pm to 9pm. Special games, gamemodes, modifications and more. See someone at the front desk for more details.
